lines.text: Well... I don't know <c=#FF00FF>how</c> it backfired, exactly... but I think I can tell you <c=#FF00FF>why.</c>
Huh? What's that supposed to mean?
Well... you've got police surrounding the building, right?
And searchin' an expanded perimeter, yeah. Standard procedure for this sort of thing. No way is anyone escapin'.
...Not that it matters, since it looks like everyone involved is already dead.
Well, yeah. Maybe that's exactly it! The Stop Wizard didn't want to go to jail, so...
He decided to go out on his own terms! That's why the fancy pose- he was making a memorial to himself!
What, you want me to rule this a suicide?
...I don't like it. Seems a little too clean, for how weird this crime scene is.
We can keep that in mind, but let's try something else for now.
